message:
Jobs: .NET software developer 

Diagnosoft for Healthcare  (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a software Engineer with the following specs:
B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or Engineering.
Minimum 2 years experience  in .Net Technologies with C# Language 
Good Experience in ASP.NET MVC , JQuery, AJAX, WCF
 Solid knowledge of OOP, UML, HTML, and XML
Knowledge of Agile development life cycles is a plus.
Experience with MS SQL databases and MS SQL scripting.
Knowledge of Team Foundation Server (TFS) is a plus.
Please send your resume to suha.maarouf@diagnosoft.com and write (SDTY) in the subject line of the email
story: Mohamed Sameeh Sharaf shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Diagnosoft - The Standard in Cardiac MRI Analysis
